snippet.title: Swift: Facebook Messenger - Auto Layout Using Code or Programmatically (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
We'll kick off this weekend by recreating the Facebook Messenger chat application.  In this video, I'll go through how to create the initial screen of friends from scratch.  We'll learn about how to align views using Autolayout in code without storyboards.

iOS Basic Training Course:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Source code and written guide available here:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Facebook-Chat-Messenger

Follow me on Twitter:
twitter.com/buildthatapp
